00046 //
00047 //! complete l'iterateur et l'evaluateur
00048 void Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::associer(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00049                                         const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_cl_dis,
00050                                         const Champ_Inc& ch_diffuse)
00051 {
00052   const Champ_P0_VDF& inco = ref_cast(Champ_P0_VDF,ch_diffuse.valeur());
00053   const Zone_VDF& zvdf = ref_cast(Zone_VDF,zone_dis.valeur());
00054   const Zone_Cl_VDF& zclvdf = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF,zone_cl_dis.valeur());
00055   iter.associer(zvdf, zclvdf, *this);
00056 
00057   Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi& eval_diff_turb =
00058     dynamic_cast<Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi&> (iter.evaluateur());
00059   eval_diff_turb.associer_zones(zvdf, zclvdf );
00060   eval_diff_turb.associer_inconnue(inco );
00061 }
00062

00064 //
00065 //! associe le champ de diffusivite a l'evaluateur
00066 void Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::associer_diffusivite(const Champ_base& ch_diff)
00067 {
00068   Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi& eval_diff_turb =
00069     dynamic_cast<Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi&> (iter.evaluateur());
00070   eval_diff_turb.associer(ch_diff);
00071 }
00072 
00073 const Champ_base& Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::diffusivite() const
00074 {
00075   const Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi& eval_diff_turb =
00076     dynamic_cast<const Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi&> (iter.evaluateur());
00077   return eval_diff_turb.get_diffusivite();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::associer_diffusivite_turbulente(const Champ_Fonc& diff_turb)
00081 {
00082   Op_Diff_Turbulent_base::associer_diffusivite_turbulente(diff_turb);
00083   Evaluateur_VDF& eval = iter.evaluateur();
00084   Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi& eval_diff_turb =
00085     dynamic_cast<Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi&> (eval);
00086   eval_diff_turb.associer_diff_turb(diff_turb);
00087 }

00089 void Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::associer_loipar(const Turbulence_paroi_scal& loi_paroi)
00090 {
00091 // loipar = loi_paroi;
00092   Evaluateur_VDF& eval = iter.evaluateur();
00093   Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi& eval_diff_turb =
00094     dynamic_cast<Eval_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi&> (eval);
00095   eval_diff_turb.associer_loipar(loi_paroi);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::completer()
00099 {
00100 // Cerr << "Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::completer()" << finl;
00101   Op_Dift_VDF_base::completer();
00102   const RefObjU& modele_turbulence = equation().get_modele(TURBULENCE);
00103   const Modele_turbulence_scal_base& mod_turb = ref_cast(Modele_turbulence_scal_base,modele_turbulence.valeur());
00104   const Champ_Fonc& lambda_t = mod_turb.conductivite_turbulente();
00105   associer_diffusivite_turbulente(lambda_t);
00106   const Turbulence_paroi_scal& loipar = mod_turb.loi_paroi();
00107   associer_loipar(loipar);
00108 }
00109 
00110 double Op_Dift_VDF_var_Elem_Axi::calculer_dt_stab() const
00111 {
00112   double dt_stab;
00113   double coef;
00114   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = iter.zone();
00115   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VDF.elem_faces();
00116   const DoubleVect& alpha = diffusivite().valeurs();
00117   const DoubleVect& alpha_t = diffusivite_turbulente()->valeurs();
00118 
00119 // Calcul du pas de temps de stabilite :
00120 // 
00121 // 
00122 // - La diffusivite est non constante donc:
00123 // 
00124 // dt_stab = Min (1/(2*(diff_lam(i)+diff_turb(i))*coeff(elem))
00125 // 
00126 // avec :
00127 // coeff =  1/(dx*dx) + 1/(dy*dy) + 1/(dz*dz)
00128 // 
00129 // i decrivant l'ensemble des elements du maillage
00130 // 
00131 
00132   coef= -1.e10;
00133   double alpha_local,h_x,h_y,h_z;
00134 
00135   if (dimension == 2)
00136     {
00137       int numfa[4];
00138       for (int elem=0; elem<zone_VDF.nb_elem(); elem++)
00139         {
00140           for (int i=0; i<4; i++)
00141             numfa[i] = elem_faces(elem,i);
00142           h_x = zone_VDF.dist_face_axi(numfa[0],numfa[2],0);
00143           h_y = zone_VDF.dist_face_axi(numfa[1],numfa[3],1);
00144           alpha_local = (alpha(elem)+alpha_t(elem))
00145                         *(1/(h_x*h_x) + 1/(h_y*h_y));
00146           coef = max(coef,alpha_local);
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150   else if (dimension == 3)
00151     {
00152       int numfa[6];
00153       for (int elem=0; elem<zone_VDF.nb_elem(); elem++)
00154         {
00155           for (int i=0; i<6; i++)
00156             numfa[i] = elem_faces(elem,i);
00157           h_x = zone_VDF.dist_face_axi(numfa[0],numfa[3],0);
00158           h_y = zone_VDF.dist_face_axi(numfa[1],numfa[4],1);
00159           h_z = zone_VDF.dist_face_axi(numfa[2],numfa[5],2);
00160           alpha_local = (alpha(elem)+alpha_t(elem))
00161                         *(1/(h_x*h_x) + 1/(h_y*h_y) + 1/(h_z*h_z));
00162           coef = max(coef,alpha_local);
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166   dt_stab = 1/(2*(coef+DMINFLOAT));
00167 
00168   return dt_stab;
00169 }
